promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi young special frilled-lizard electric-type pokemon with white scales. It can be found in city-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or frilled-lizard. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Frillectro, a a chibi young special frilled-lizard electric-type pokemon. It can be found in city-like environments It has the following abilities: Gadget Bolt. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "frilled-lizard", "electric" or "Frillectro". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, frilled-lizard-like, special, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, lightning background
generatedDescription: With its unique Gadget Bolt, this urban-dwelling chibi creature sparks playfully as it scampers up lampposts, delighting city-dwellers with lit-up frills.
